item.title: What a Rmd Cheatsheet Doesn't Tell Me
item.description: Updated on 2020-08-29: I’ve migrated my blog from blogdown to hugo so this post might be outdated. See the original post for examples. Updated on 2019-09-08: Today I realized the best approach to insert a centered image inside a html-supported markdown post is:
